name: Attachment Viewer Widget
author: Alexandre Girard

sections.description:
Attachment Viewer is a widget to place in your blog sidebar to display the latest attachment pictures of your blog.

You can change the widget title, number of items, link destination and displayed category in the widget options.
sections.installation:
1. Upload attachview.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Presentacion->Widget and add Latest Picture widget tyo your sidebar
  4. Configure Latest Picture widget as you need

short_description: Attachment Viewer is a widget to place in your blog sidebar to display the latest attachment pictures of your blog.
